text:
WH Coronavirus TF: 
1. Still clinging to discredited idea increase due to testing.
2. No coherent overview for an imminent public health crisis in our Southern metro areas
3. No concrete federal plan for helping metro areas.
4. No predictive models
3. Disconnected facts/factoids
